Verses: 1 aandavaraip Palipeedaththinmel Nirkakkanden; Avar: Nee Vaasal Nilaigal Asaiyumpadi Podhigaiyai Adiththu, Avaigalai Avargal Ellaarudaiya Thalaiyinmelum Vizha Udaiththuppodu; Avargalukkup Pinnaagavarum Meedhiyaanavargalai Naan Pattayaththinaal Kondrupoduven; Avargalil Odugiravan Oruvanum Thappuvadhumillai, Avargalil Thappugiravan Oruvanum Ratchikkappaduvadhumillai.

2 avargal Paadhaalapariyandham Thondip Padhungikkondaalum, En Kai Avvidaththilirundhu Avargalaip Pidiththukkonduvarum; Avargal Vaanapariyandham Erinaalum Avvidaththilumirundhu Avargalai Irangappannuven;

3 avargal Karmelin Kodumudiyile Oliththukkondaalum, Ange Avargalaith Thedippidippen; Avargal Samuththiraththin Aazhaththile Poi En Kangalukku Maraindhukondaalum, Ange Avargalaik Kadikkap Paambugalukkuk Kattalaiyiduven.
4 avargal Thangal Saththuruvukku Munbaaga Siraippattupponaalum, Ange Avargalaik Kondrupodap Pattayaththukku Naan Kattalaiyittu, En Kangalai Avargalmel Nanmaikkalla, Theemaikkendre Vaippen.

5 senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Dhesaththaith Thoda, Adhu Urugippom; Appozhudhu Adhin Kudigalellaarum Pulambuvaargal; Engum Nadhiyaaip Purandodi, Egipthinudaiya Aatru Vellaththaippol Vellamaagum.

6 avar Vaanaththil Thamadhu Melaraigalaik Katti, Boomiyil Thamadhu Keezharaigalai Asthibaarappaduththi, Samuththiraththin Thanneergalai Varavazhaiththu, Avargalai Boomiyinudaiya Visaalaththinmel Ootrugiravar; Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam.

7 isravel Puththirare, Neengal Enakku Eththiyoppiyarin Puththiraraippol Irukkireergal Allavo Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Isravelai Egipthudhesaththilirundhum, Pelistharaik Kapthorilirundhum, Seeriyaraik Keerilirundhum Konduvaravillaiyo?

8 idho, Karththaraagiya Aandavarin Kangal Paavamulla Raajyaththukku Virodhamaaga Vaikkappattirukkiradhu; Adhai Boomiyinmel Iraadhapadikku Azhiththuppoduven; Aagilum Yaakkobin Vamsaththai Muzhuvadhum Azhikkamaatten Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
9 idho, Jalladaiyinaal Saliththarikkiradhupol Isravel Vamsaththaarai Ellaa Jaadhigalukkullum Saliththarikkumpadikku Naan Kattalaiyiduven; Aanaalum Oru Kodhumaimaniyum Tharaiyile Vizhuvadhillai.
10 theengu Engalai Anuguvadhumillai, Engalukku Neriduvadhumillaiyendru En Janaththil Sollugira Paavigalellaarum Pattayaththinaal Saavaargal.
11 edhomil Meedhiyaanavargalaiyum, En Naamam Vilangiya Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Vasamaakkikkollumpadikku,

12 annaalile Vizhundhupona Dhaaveedhin Koodaaraththai Naan Thirumba Eduppiththu, Adhin Thirappugalai Adaiththu, Adhil Pazhudhaaipponadhai Seerppaduththi, Poorvanaatkalilirundhadhupola Adhai Sthaabippenendru Idhai Seygira Karththar Sollugiraar.

13 idho, Uzhugiravan Arukkiravanaiyum, Dhraatchappazhangalai Aalaiyaadugiravan Vidhaikkiravanaiyum Thodarndhupidiththu, Parvadhangal Dhraatcharasamaai Vadigiradhum, Medugalellaam Karaigiradhumaana Naatkalvarum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

14 en Janamaagiya Isravelin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppuven; Avargal Paazhaana Nagarangalaik Katti, Avaigalil Kudiyirundhu, Dhraatchaththottangalai Naatti, Avaigaludaiya Pazharasaththaik Kudiththu, Thottangalai Undaakki, Avaigalin Kanigalaip Pusippaargal.
15 avargalai Avargal Dhesaththile Naattuven; Naan Avargalukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththilirundhu Avargal Inip Pidungappaduvadhillaiyendru Un Dhevanaagiyakarththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
